Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vociferous \Vo*cif"er*ous\, a. [Cf. F. vocif[`e]re.] Making a loud outcry; clamorous; noisy; as, vociferous heralds. -- {Vo*cif"er*ous*ly}, adv. -- {Vo*cif"er*ous*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
vociferously adv : in a vociferous manner; "he complained vociferously"
